headlines.description: Sampdoria's veteran forward Fabio Quagliarella inspired them to a rousing comeback at Parma on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Quagliarella inspires Samp comeback in five-goal thriller

headlines.description: Fiorentina took advantage of two defensive mishaps to beat Torino 2-0 in a Serie A match between two teams stuck in the middle of the table.
headlines.shortLinkText: Defensive mishaps cost Torino as Belotti run ends

headlines.description: Napoli forward Matteo Politano scored deep into stoppage time to give them a 2-1 win at home to Udinese on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Politano gives Napoli last-gasp win vs. Udinese

headlines.description: Inter Milan substitute Romelu Lukaku's penalty in the 88th minute salvaged a 2-2 draw at AS Roma in Serie A on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Late Lukaku penalty salvages point for Inter at Roma
